name: BOUNCE iT (Pink Shades Studios)
description:
This is my first attempt at making a game. It is a silly little game where you control a paddle using the mouse and try to keep up with a ball that, over time, get smaller and faster.

Your target is to get the highest score possible.

The game is still under development. This release is just a beta version that only includes the core game loop. It is currently available for Windows, Mac OS X and Linux. Mobile versions of the game are planned once the game development is complete.

The game is developed from scratch, using no game engines, relying only on the SDL library.
